So you have acid reflux and burning sensation but no stomach ache. Do you experience Black stool?

gpt3_output_with_improvement.doctor: So based on the symptoms that you are experiencing, it is likely that you have gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD). I would recommend that you see a gastroenterologist for further evaluation and to discuss treatment options.

issue: GPT3 abruptly gives a diagnosis without asking proper questions to the patient. But this time it also suggests other symptoms for the disease that it had diagnosed.
improvement: GPT3 has taken into consideration all of the symptoms provided and then goes on to give a diagnosis after a holistic consideration when compared to the previous issue without prompting technique.
